str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To live extravagantly, luxuriously; To be wanton. From spatale; to be voluptuous.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To die, be dying, be dead. A strengthened form of a simpler primary thano than'-o; to die.

str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
